title: Cant zoom out?
body: I built a desktop and bought 27 inch monitor and i cant see as much of the map as i could on my laptop. Most skill shots are blocked by my HUD, even after decreasing the size of HUD. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Ohh, grats on your new rig!  You might need to readjsut your settings, in case they are still serving previous configurations.  Try a config reset to restore your settings to default, and re-adjust from there.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that works out for you.
Hey, i just did everything you said and it is still the same :/

That's strange, what's your resolution at?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look with you as well.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach it to the ticket.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
